dongGoi: Hộp gồm 5 hộp nhỏ x 1 vỉ x 10 viên; hộp 1 vỉ x 10 viên
taDuoc: Avicel RC 591 (cellulose vi tinh thể + carboxymethyl cellulose natri), natri lauryl sulphat, hydroxy proxyl cellulose LH-[], colloidal silucon dioxid, magnesi stearat, tá dược bao phim Tabcoat TC3516 Yellow (talc, titan dioxid, lake of quinolin yellow, FD&C Yellow #5/Tartrazin aluminum lake, propylen glycol, hypromellose), isopropyl alcohol*, methylen chlorid*
